indications:
Indications hyperlipidaemias of types IIb and IV in patients who have not responded
adequately to diet and other appropriate measures
name: ACIPIMOX
side-effects:
Side-effects vasodilatation, flushing, itching, rashes, urticaria,
erythema; heartburn, epigastric pain, nausea, diarrhoea, headache,
malaise, dry eyes; rarely angioedema, bronchospasm, anaphylaxis
doses: Usually 500–750 mg daily in divided doses
